message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this product. It's a unique item that I think you'll really love.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me halfway?
I can do better than that! I can offer you a discount, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $160?
I'm still a bit above my budget, can you think of a way to get closer to my target of $120?
I'm not willing to go as low as $130, but I can try to find a middle ground. How about we meet at $145?
I'm still a bit far from my target, can you think of a way to get closer to $120?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting stuck in a loop. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet at $140?
I'm getting close, but I still need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $125?
I'm not willing to go below $140, but I'm willing to make a small concession. How about we meet at $138?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm willing to make a final offer. Can you meet me at $130?
